Package gobblin.yarn

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainerMetrics
    Extension of GobblinMetrics specifically for YARN containers.
    GobblinApplicationMaster
    The Yarn ApplicationMaster class for Gobblin.
    GobblinHelixJob
    An implementation of a Quartz's Job that uses a GobblinHelixJobLauncher to launch a Gobblin job.
    GobblinHelixJobLauncher
    An implementation of JobLauncher that launches a Gobblin job on Yarn using the Helix task framework.
    GobblinHelixJobScheduler
    An extension to JobScheduler that schedules and runs Gobblin jobs on Helix using GobblinHelixJobLaunchers.
    GobblinHelixTask
    An implementation of Helix's Task that wraps and runs one or more Gobblin Tasks.
    GobblinHelixTaskFactory
    An implementation of Helix's TaskFactory for GobblinHelixTasks.
    GobblinHelixTaskStateTracker
    A concrete extension to AbstractTaskStateTracker for Gobblin on Yarn.
    GobblinTaskStateModel
    A state model for a Gobblin task that implements all supported state transitions.
    GobblinTaskStateModelFactory
    A TaskStateModelFactory for GobblinTaskStateModels.
    GobblinWorkUnitRunner
    The main class running in the containers managing services for running Gobblin WorkUnits.
    GobblinYarnAppLauncher
    A client driver to launch Gobblin as a Yarn application.
    GobblinYarnConfigurationKeys
    A central place for configuration related constants of Gobblin on Yarn.
    GobblinYarnEventNames
    YARN specific metadata keys to be used with an EventSubmitter.
    GobblinYarnMetricTagNames
    A central place for constants of MetricContext tag names for Gobblin on Yarn.
    JobConfigurationManager
    A class for managing Gobblin job configurations.
    Log4jConfigurationHelper
    A helper class for programmatically configuring log4j.
    YarnAppSecurityManager
    A class for managing Kerberos login and token renewing on the client side that has access to the keytab file.
    YarnContainerSecurityManager
    A class for managing token renewing in the containers including the container for the GobblinApplicationMaster.
    YarnHelixUtils
    A utility class for Gobblin on Yarn/Helix.
    YarnService
    This class is responsible for all Yarn-related stuffs including ApplicationMaster registration, ApplicationMaster un-registration, Yarn container management, etc.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HelixMessageSubTypes
    An enumeration of Helix message sub types.
